nodes.text: A songfish was a type of fish that was found in the streams of the planet Caamas. It was capable of producing an audible piping noise. Around 18 BBY, the Caamasi artist, Ves Volette, experienced a memnis while on the planet Coruscant. During the experience, he heard songfish in a stream near his hamlet in Jualya Village before the village was destroyed. The memnis was a vivid memory caused by many offworld Caamasi learning of the Galactic Empire's destruction of their homeworld.
The songfish was first featured in Coruscant Nights II: Street of Shadows, a 2008 novel written by Michael Reaves.
